ValidationRule.description: Both Per Diem fields have to be either blank or filled in if the Expense Policy is Per Diem.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Expense_Policy__c, "Per Diem"), AND( ISBLANK(Per_Diem_Domestic__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Per_Diem_International__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Expense Policy is Per Diem, both the Per Diem (Domestic) and Per Diem (International) fields must either be filled out or blank.
